channel.title: Fastest cheapest way to 94 mage?
channel.description: alright i need to get 94 mage on my main (name is dh713) and i want to know the fastest and cheapest way to get there... i have 88 mage. I was alching but that is expensive.

@Blapmanjr wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:1, topic:90634”]alright i need to get 94 mage on my main (name is dh713) and i want to know the fastest and cheapest way to get there… i have 88 mage. I was alching but that is expensive.[/quote]Mage training arena? spend 3m on gettin inf skirt & then sell it for 4.9, When 80cb u get like a lvl a day from this routine

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest cheapest way to 94 mage?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Ooo Java, post:12, topic:90634”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=132300.msg1281115#msg1281115 date=1178558219]

i bought a mud staff and 200k odd thousand of body runes and done curse to zammy mage in varok castle also wear melee armour

Lel what i did once, is my brother and i both level 3 went to the duel arena wearing full iron, and a air staff.I bought 40k Minds and me and my bro split them 50/50. We just casted and it was splashville! Yet we still got xp :). Easy Leveling i say…and we also went out an played football for ages

What level magic did you get it to?
[/quote]
This is on old hybird, got to 80 in about 3 days i had to keep buying minds though[/quote]

On air strike? wow…

Read full topic

You loose about 100k each 1k of yew long alchs

item.title: Fastest cheapest way to 94 mage?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Lol, your fletching is the same level as mine, that smexy <3

Theres three options that i recomend…

  1. Fletch magic long bows and then alch them (I hate doing this but it makes me some extra money)
  2. Mage training arena (my brother trained from 70 to 80 mage in like a few days, but it will cost some money i think)
  3. Pest control and use your points towards magic xp (i like this way because it helps me gain 2-4 levels a day if im in a good world)

Read full topic
